headline: GTA Online
subtitle: This Week on the Podium: Übermacht Rebla GTS
content:
Stop by the lobby of The Diamond Casino & Resort any time this week and spin the Lucky Wheel. You’ll walk away with GTA$, RP, clothes, snacks, or a mystery prize.

If you’re really lucky, you’ll roll away behind the wheel of the Übermacht Rebla GTS, a German-made sport utility vehicle that hides a muscular rage underneath its sophisticated, demure exterior. Go ahead, rev that engine, and let the animal out. You won’t regret it.
